message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but you get a small share to start.
My turn. How about a more realistic split? This offer won't last forever.
Let's try to be reasonable.  I'm willing to give you a larger share, but we need to come to an agreement quickly before the value of the money drops even further.
Time is running out Alice.  This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
